headline: Datadog (NASDAQ:DDOG) Delivers Strong Q2 Numbers, Full-Year Outlook Exceeds Expectations
summary: Cloud monitoring software company Datadog (NASDAQ:DDOG) reported Q2 CY2025 results beating Wall Street’s revenue expectations, with sales up 28.1% year on year to $826.8 million. On top of that, next quarter’s revenue guidance ($849 million at the midpoint) was surprisingly good and 3.7% above what analysts were expecting. Its non-GAAP profit of $0.57 per share was 39.8% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: Datadog forecasts upbeat third-quarter results on increased cloud security adoption
summary: Cloud security firm Datadog forecast third-quarter revenue above Wall Street estimates on Thursday, signaling growing demand for its services as enterprises ramp up investment in artificial intelligence. Shares of the New York City-based company surged more than 10% in premarket trading. Businesses are accelerating the adoption of AI and cloud technologies, driving increased demand for Datadog's suite of products that monitor and secure cloud-based applications to ensure performance, reliability, and security of these systems.

headline: Wall Street Says Datadog (DDOG) Is One of Two Key Winners in Observability
summary: Datadog, Inc. (NASDAQ:DDOG) is one of the AI Stocks Gaining Attention on Wall Street.
